name: hacker-dashboard
description: Dashboard for participants, judges, mentors and partners of QHacks 2018.
author: Robert Saunders and Zack Harley

scripts.build: npm run test && lerna run build --stream
scripts.dev: lerna run build --scope email && lerna run dev --scope server --scope client --stream --parallel
scripts.test: cross-env eslint packages/server/**/*.js packages/client/**/*.js && nsp check --reporter checkstyle && ncu -e 2 -x mongoose
